thread.title: Obama gives Kanye West some tips for his presidential run
thread.title_full: Obama gives Kanye West some tips for his presidential run - San Francisco Chronicle

title: Obama gives Kanye West some tips for his presidential run
text: Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP President Barack Obama waves to guests as he takes the stage during a Democratic fundraiser at the Warfield Theater, Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015 in San Francisco. President Barack Obama waves to guests as he takes the stage during... SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — If you're going to run for president, Kanye West, you might as well listen to someone who's been there and done that. President Barack Obama waves to guests as he takes the stage during a Democratic fundraiser at the Warfield Theater, Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015 in San Francisco.
